nodes.title: ASML Holding N.V.
nodes.short_description: Sole EUV supplier; tool availability dictates TSMC's leading-node output.

nodes.title: U.S. Department of Commerce Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS)
nodes.short_description: Administers U.S. export controls; restricts sales to China and tool access.

nodes.title: NVIDIA Corporation
nodes.short_description: Largest AI chip customer; drives leading-node and CoWoS capacity demand.

nodes.title: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.
nodes.short_description: Primary advanced-node foundry competitor; impacts pricing, capacity, and technology race.

nodes.title: Intel Corporation
nodes.short_description: Competitor and customer; outsourcing and foundry competition affect capacity and strategy.

nodes.title: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc.
nodes.short_description: Major CPU/GPU customer; demand influences advanced-node utilization and pricing.

nodes.title: Applied Materials, Inc.
nodes.short_description: Critical deposition/etch equipment supplier; tool lead times constrain capacity ramps.

nodes.title: MediaTek Inc.
nodes.short_description: High-volume mobile SoC customer; drives mid-to-advanced node capacity.

nodes.title: CoWoS (Chip-on-Wafer-on-Substrate)
nodes.short_description: TSMC's advanced packaging; throughput limits constrain AI chip shipments.

nodes.title: EUV lithography systems
nodes.short_description: Essential for N7+ and below; availability caps wafer starts.

nodes.title: N3 (3nm) process technology
nodes.short_description: Flagship node; yield and ramp set revenue and competitiveness.

nodes.title: CHIPS and Science Act of 2022
nodes.short_description: U.S. subsidies and guardrails shape TSMC's U.S. fabs and China investments.

nodes.title: Dutch export controls on advanced lithography equipment
nodes.short_description: Licensing limits ASML shipments to China; alters competitive dynamics.

nodes.title: U.S. sanctions on Huawei/HiSilicon (2019â€“2020)
nodes.short_description: Forced TSMC to cease shipments; materially reduced China revenue.

nodes.title: Taiwan
nodes.short_description: Home base; power, water, and geopolitics directly affect operations.
